gwendolyncrclclient

Class CShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • gwendolyncrclclient.CShape
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class CShape
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    Shape describes the basic attributes of the world model ojects Each object has a name, type and location. Slots can also be shapes. Trays also have a contains "slot" items. Also each shape has inferences about its state - for example if a slot is open, or contains a gear. Depending on the parent (kit or supply tray) this can be a free gear or a filled slot.

    • Nested Class Summary

      inference structure for describing a shape inferences.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CShape

        public CShape()
        constructor for spaee, intiializes the contains container for slots. Slots are immutable (each tray has a fixed number) but the inferences define the slot state and can dynamically change.

      • CShape

        public CShape(java.lang.String name,
              java.lang.String type,
              rcs.posemath.PmPose pose,
              CShape parent)
        constructor for spaee, intiializes the contains container for slots. Slots are immutable (each tray has a fixed number) but the inferences define the slot state and can dynamically change.
        Parameters:
        name - sku name of the shape
        type - sku name minus numeric trailing idetnfier
        pose - PmPose of the shape
        parent - parent of the spape

      • CShape

        public boolean isKit()

      • isVessel

        public boolean isVessel()

        Returns:
        true if shape is supply vessel.
